page.title: 13Transport in Cronton
page.content: {Transport}Cronton is within easy access of the M62,M57 and M6 motorways,convenient for travel in all directions.The A5080 Cronton Rd. runs through Cronton. It has a steady flow of cars,bicycles,motorbikes,tractors and lorries,many of which are carrying dangerous chemicals to and from the local chemical works. {Railway}Widnes Railway Station is 2 miles away and the line runs from Manchester to Liverpool. {Buses}There is a local hourly bus service to and from Widnes,to reach Liverpool we are reliant on another hourly service. {Cars}Many local journeys are only possible by car. Out of the 66 households asked, 80 cars were owned,51 of British,29 of Foreign make.
